snippet: Through the quirks of the N.F.L. postseason format, Carolina (7-8-1), as a division winner, will have home field advantage over the 11-5 Arizona Cardinals in Saturday’s wild-card matchup.
abstract: Keeping Score column; Carolina Panthers will have home field advantage over Arizona Cardinals in upcoming wild-card matchup because of quirky NFL playoff format; Cardinals have been playing well all season, while Panthers pulled it together recently, winning four consecutive games.
lead_paragraph: Through the quirks of the N.F.L. postseason format, Carolina (7-8-1), as a division winner, will have home field advantage over the 11-5 Arizona Cardinals in Saturday’s wild-card matchup.

headline.main: N.F.L. Playoffs, as Seen From Below .500
headline.print_headline: Playoffs Through the Years, as Seen From Below the .500 Mark
